original: Paṭṭhānapakaraṇa
analyzed: paṭṭhāna pakaraṇa

original: Dhammapaccanīyānuloma (4), Dukatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (3)
analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi

original: 21.52. Mahantaraduka, Sanidassanattika
analyzed: mahantara duka sani dassana ttika

original: Nasārammaṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na sa ārammaṇam na sa nidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca anārammaṇaḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Naanārammaṇaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo sanidassanasappaṭigho
analyzed: na anārammaṇam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca anārammaṇaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka saṅkhitta hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: (Anidassanasappaṭighe tīṇiyeva.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: anidassana sa paṭighe tīṇi yeva hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe aññamaññe ekam pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasārammaṇaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anārammaṇo anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na sa ārammaṇam na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca anārammaṇaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekaṃ pe avigate eka

original: Nocittaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: no cittam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca no cittaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Nanocittaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocitto sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na no cittam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca no cittaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nacetasikaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nacetasiko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na cetasikam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca na cetasikaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nacittasampayuttaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittavippayutto sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na citta sampayuttam na sa nidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca citta vippayuttaḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nacittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittavisaṁsaṭṭho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na citta sasaṭṭham na sa nidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca citta visasaṭṭhaḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhāno sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Cittasamuṭṭhānarūpeneva tīṇi. Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: no citta samuṭṭhānam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca citta samuṭṭhānaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā citta samuṭṭhāna rūpena iva tīṇi

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nocittasahabhuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasahabhū sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: no citta sahabhum na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca no citta sahabhū sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nocittānuparivattiṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittānuparivattī sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: no citta anuparivattim na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca no citta anuparivattī sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: no citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhānam na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca no citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhānaḥ sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: no citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhum na sa nidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca no citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna sahabhū sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī
analyzed: no citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattim na sanidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca no citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattī

original: sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Naajjhattikaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na ajjhattikam na sanidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca bāhiraḥ sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Nabāhiraṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca bāhiro sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na bāhiram na sa nidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca bāhiraḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Noupādā nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca upādā sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: no upādā na sa nidassana sa paṭigham dhammam paṭicca upādā sa nidassana sa paṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Naupādinnaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anupādinno sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na aupādinnam na sanidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca anupādinnaḥ sanidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta

original: Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
